ygData.subject: Whats is the skill cap on our Instrument skills?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have reached 40th and dont remember any skill improvements yet over the 200 mark. Do our instrument skills go over 200? Do all our weapon skills cap at 200?
ygData.messageBody:
I have reached 40th and dont remember any skill improvements yet over the
200 mark. Do our instrument skills go over 200? Do all our weapon skills cap
at 200?

-----Original Message-----
From: Benoit St-Hilaire [mailto:bsthilai@...]
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 7:18 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] *KABONG* (was re: End of kiting...)


From: Benoit St-Hilaire <bsthilai@...>

Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> Okay - as Keith pointed out, that's the end of this thread, unless we can
> make it more Bard-related.
>
> Which reminds me, I had a question about one of our DoT's. Can anyone
> explain how much damage, and how, Chords of Dissonance deals out?

Hehe. I just tested out CoD and DDD with a friend a couple of days ago.

DDD (Horn) about 63 Dmg ( 3 tics)
DDD (Sing) about 30 Dmg ( 3 tics)

CoD (Mandolin) about 53 Dmg ( 3 tics)
CoD (Sing) about 25 Dmg ( 3 tics)

I was lvl 30,
String at 155,
Singing at 155,
Brass at 132.
Dex 131
Cha 114

I forgot to ask him how mutch AC he lost when i was playing DDD... will have
to
check that out some other time.

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

"Tourists: have some fun with New York's hard-boiled cabbies. When you get
to
your destination, say to your driver, 'Pay? I was hitchhiking.'"
-- David Letterman
